sentences.en: Chapter V Succour Measures and Legal Liability.
sentences.cn: 第五章救助措施与法律责任.

sentences.en: Damaged the opposite person who harm can acquire the succour through the law path.
sentences.cn: 受损害的受指导方可以通过法律途径获得救济.

sentences.en: Franklin Roosevelt's New Deal promised security and succour to those in need.
sentences.cn: 富兰克林-罗斯福总统的 “ 新政”许诺给予有需要的人以安全和帮助.

sentences.en: Gates turned for succour to his frist love overseeling software development.
sentences.cn: 盖茨只好求助于他心爱的软件来排忧解难,他决定全面掌管软件的开发工作.

sentences.en: Hatred with friend is succour to foe.
Helicopters fly in appalling weather to succour shipwrecked mariners.
sentences.cn: 直升机在恶劣的天气条件下起飞前去援救遇难的船员。

sentences.en: Other reforms give some succour to those seeking to reduce animal suffering.
sentences.cn: 其他方面的一些变革也给了想要减轻动物痛苦的人们一些机会.

sentences.en: Thailand has long called travelers from around the globe to take spiritual succour and karmic rest.
sentences.cn: 泰国长期以来一直呼吁来自世界各地的旅客采取宗教精神救助和休息.

sentences.en: The damaged investors do not get law succour.
sentences.cn: 使受到损害的投资者得不到充分的法律救助.

sentences.en: The speediest succour might avail to the preservation of his life.
sentences.cn: 赶紧抢救也许能保住他的生命.

sentences.en: They give succour to the victims of war.
sentences.cn: 他们向战争受害者提供援助。
